about.title: Kai-Chun Hsu
about.subtitle: I write fantasy novels and iOS code.
about.introduction:
Hey, thanks for stopping by üòé



I grew up in Taipei, currently work as an software engineer at Meta in the SF Bay Area.



I'm passionate about opportunities serving & empowering creators to make a living while working on their creative pursuits. I myself wanted to be a novelist when I was a kid too.



Outside of work, I enjoy writing a lot. If that sounds interesting to you, you can read more about how I (re)started writing (about 2 years ago), my experience of a writing bootcamp, and my learnings from writing. I now write monthly blog posts, a fantasy novel (hoping to finish/publish it in 2025), and scoping out 2 more short stories for 2026.
